'''Effendi''' is the Reputation Advisor for [[Sumeru]]. He is located in the [[Citadel of Regzar]], situated in [[Sumeru City]].

He gives the [[World Quest]] [[Corps of Thirty Recruitment]], which unlocks Sumeru's [[Reputation]] menu. He can be found under the {{DIcon|Reputation}} icon on the map.

Effendi is a Liaison Officer from the Sumeru Akademiya assigned to the Citadel of Regzar. His work includes listening to various investigation reports, coordinating the work of the Corps of Thirty, and arranging for staff to help folks from Sumeru solve problems or expel monsters and bandits in the wilderness. He does these work by communicating mainly with the Parchamdar, [[Rukh Shah]], and the logistics officer, [[Yunus]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Reputation Level 1–2)
:'''Effendi:''' Greetings, welcome to the Citadel of Regzar. Would you be interested in taking on some commissions?
;(Reputation Level 3-6)
:'''Effendi:''' It's been a while. Are you here again today for the Residents' Commissions?
;(Reputation Level 7-10)
:'''Effendi:''' You're here! Welcome! How have you been? All good? I've got some new commissions here. It'll be great if you'd be willing to help.
:{{DIcon|Reputation}} How's my reputation in Sumeru City?
:;(Reputation Level 1-2)
::'''Effendi:''' If you're willing to help complete some commissions, I can pay you.
:;(Reputation Level 3-6)
::'''Effendi:''' On behalf of the Akademiya, I thank you for your contribution to Sumeru City.
:;(Reputation Level 7-10)
::'''Effendi:''' Everyone speaks highly of your work, and even the most taciturn grizzled mercenary nodded in agreement. I hope you work with us for a long time.
:;(Opens Sumeru Reputation menu)
:{{DIcon}} Tell me about yourself...
::'''Effendi:''' I am the liaison officer sent by the [[Akademiya]] to the Citadel of Regzar.
::'''Effendi:''' The Citadel of Regzar is the gathering place of the [[Corps of Thirty]]. Many of [[the Eremites]] come and go every day.
::'''Effendi:''' But I mainly communicate with the [[Rukh Shah|Parchamdar]] and the [[Yunus|logistics officer]].
::'''Effendi:''' The Parchamdar used to be a researcher, and the logistics officer is friendly too. Overall, everyone is communicative and it's made my job much easier.
::'''Effendi:''' But the people of the Corps of Thirty are still too occupied by the commissions from the Akademiya, so I will post part of the commissions to the public.
::'''Effendi:''' The logistics officer, [[Yunus]], is also greatly in favor of this practice, and is willing to allocate a portion of their military supplies as payment.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Effendi:''' Farewell.
{{Dialogue end}}

== Trivia ==
=== Etymology ===
* "Effendi" is a Turkish title of courtesy and respect, comparable to "sir" in English, usually spoken after the person's given name. It is generally applied to people who are of high station or education.
